    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>cahi1:data_99397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Evaporation of liquids without heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfung der Flüssigkeiten ohne Heizung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaporation des liquides sans chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evaporação dos líquidos sem heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Evaporazione dei liquidi senza heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάτμιση των υγρών χωρίς θέρμανση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evaporación de líquidos sin la calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates an experiment carried out to investigate and compare the ability of two different liquids to evaporate without the need to heat them.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cotton wool</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">laboratory experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">room temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Experiment, das 
durchgeführt wird, um die Fähigkeit von zwei unterschiedlichen 
Flüssigkeiten nachzuforschen und zu vergleichen, ohne die 
Notwendigkeit zu verdunsten, sie zu erhitzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre une expérience 
effectuée pour étudier et comparer la capacité de deux liquides 
différents de s'évaporer sans nécessité de les chauffer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra uma experiência 
realizada para investigar e comparar a abilidade de dois líquidos 
diferentes de evaporar sem a necessidade aquecê-los.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra un esperimento 
effettuato per studiare e confrontare la capacità di due liquidi 
differenti di volatilizzarsi senza la necessità di riscaldarli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ένα πείραμα που 
πραγματοποιείται για να ερευνήσει και να συγκρίνει τη δυνατότητα 
δύο διαφορετικών υγρών να εξατμίσει χωρίς την ανάγκη να 
θερμαθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra un experimento 
realizado para investigar y para comparar la capacidad de dos diversos
líquidos de evaporarse sin la necesidad de calentarlos.</string>
          </description>
